alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN HOLT AND BOYD COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM CDT... At 945 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Naper to near Lynch. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Butte, Lynch, Bristow, Dustin, Monowi, Scottville, Redbird State Wildlife Management Area, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Spencer Dam, Midway, Dorsey, Parshall Bridge State Wildlife Management Area, and Anncar. This includes the following highways... Highway 281 between mile markers 200 and 218. Highway 12 between mile markers 106 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
